author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:

The entertainment industry went through a massive shake-up early today when Netflix announced it had entered into an agreement to buy Warner Bros. Discovery for a massive $82.7 billion dollars. WBD had been shopping itself to prospective buyers in recent weeks, with rival Paramount also bidding. While the deal isn't yet finalized (and won't be until later next year), Netflix is expected to acquire WB's massive library of movies and IP, including Game of Thrones and DC Entertainment. In other news, dataminers may have found evidence of upcoming Mario Kart World DLC that may bring a Donkey Kong Bananza boss to the game. And finally, prolific actor Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa passed away yesterday at the age of 75. He was best-known for bringing Mortal Kombat villain Shang Tsung to live action in the 1995 move version, and reprising the role in later video game installments, as well.

#Netflix #WarnerBros #IGN
title: Netflix To Buy Warner Bros for $82.7 Billion - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
As part of Grinding Gear Games' ongoing efforts to implement many new content updates and changes to Path of Exile 2 in early access ahead of its 1.0 launch in 2026, we're finally getting the Druid class added to the game. In Fate of the Vaal, POE 2's latest expnasion, The Last of the Druids will finally let players get some hands-on time with the new class. Allowing you too turn into a bear, wolf, and even a Dragon, the Druid class comes with new skills, uniques to chase, and a ton of new passive skills in the already expansive skill tree.

#PathOfExile2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Path of Exile 2: New Druid Class Gameplay - Play as a Dragon!

author: IGN
description: Check out the Console Release Window and Competitive Series Update Video for 2XKO, a competitive fighting game developed by Riot Games. Players can get new details on future platform rollouts for 2XKO alongside competitive scene plans with the latest video. 2XKO is set to come to consoles in January 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S. Riot Games will also offer extensive support to the 2XKO competitive scene to best support the fighting game community through fiscal means and more. Get the full rundown on what's to come with 2XKO, available now for PC.
title: 2XKO - Official Console Release Window and Competitive Series Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Join developer Squanch Games for a behind-the-scenes look at the new skateboarding mechanic in High On Life 2. The team dives into what you can expect with this new mechanic coming to the comedy action-adventure FPS sequel to the 2022 game. High On Life 2 will be available on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S on February 13, 2026. It will also be available on Xbox Game Pass upon release. 

High On Life 2 puts you in the midst of an intergalactic conspiracy threatening the fate of humanity! Team up with a wide cast of talking alien guns as you shoot, stab, and skate your way through the exotic locales to take down the bad guys and save your favorite species (humans)!
title: High on Life 2 - Official Skateboarding Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Neath announcement trailer for this upcoming roguelike tactical RPG from Cellar Door Games (the developers behind the Rogue Legacy series). The Neath trailer showcases gameplay and its dark world. Neath is set in a decaying world shadowed by an irradiated, inverted tower. Using a fluid turn-based system where the turn order is always shifting, you dictate the actions of both friend and foe alike. Neath will be available on PC via Steam in 2026.

#Neath #Gaming #IGN
title: Neath - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the latest Spellcasters: Chronicles trailer for this online multiplayer action-strategy game for another look at gameplay, characters, and more. Cast. Fly. Fight. Cooperate. in intense 3V3 action-strategy battles, summon hundreds of creatures, cast devastating spells, and call upon the might of Titans to rise as the most powerful member of the community of Spellcasters – and shape the fate of the world. Together. Spellcasters: Chronicles will be available on PC, and the first Closed Beta weekend is live now on Steam until December 8, 2025.
title: Spellcasters: Chronicles - Official Closed Beta Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Few have faced the stalker and lived to tell the tale. Until today. Meet the Stalker zed and see this terrifying enemy in action in this new Killing Floor 3 trailer for the action FPS game.

Stalker comes to Killing Floor 3 in Season 2 Operation: Breakout. Killing Floor 3's Season 2 Operation: Breakout is available now on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X|S.

#IGN #KillingFloor3 #FPS
title: Killing Floor 3 - Official Stalker Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Launch Trailer for Guild Wars Reforged, a remastered version of the hit action-adventure fantasy MMO RPG developed by ArenaNet. Players will relive the legendary role-playing experience with new enhancements to interact with during the journey that brought players to the fall of Ascalon to the desperate stand against Nightfall. Play now with no monthly subscription to Guild Wars Reforged, available now for PC (Steam).

#GuildWarsReforged #Gaming #IGN
title: Guild Wars Reforged - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the announcement trailer for Tetra Rise, an action-platformer with roguelite elements game developed by Tora Games. You're at rock bottom, time to upgrade your equipment and face ever-growing hordes as you climb toward the surface. Every defeated enemy turns into a fixed block you can use to climb closer to the surface. Tetra Rise is coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: Tetra Rise - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the first 19 minutes of Will: Follow the Light gameplay, an upcoming adventure game coming to PC (Steam), Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5) in the first half of 2026. An open playtest will launch for PC on December 19. Players can sign up on the Steam page here -  https://store.steampowered.com/app/3144860/WILL_Follow_The_Light/

WILL: Follow The Light is a story-driven, first-person adventure puzzle game about a perilous personal journey through the harsh northern latitudes. To find peace and reunite with his family, Will must sail across endless waters, face numerous challenges, and ultimately discover himself.
title: 19 Minutes of Will: Follow the Light Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at gameplay from Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes in this new trailer for the upcoming tactical video game inspired by the iconic sci-fi franchise, Battlestar Galactica. Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes will be available on PC in early 2026.

In Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes, players command a fleet of spaceships fleeing humanity’s settled worlds, known as the Twelve Colonies. Pursued by the ruthless Cylons, survival depends on tactical brilliance and management of player’s fleets to prevent sabotage from within. Encounter planets and galactic points of interest, decide whether to spend precious resources addressing incidents within the fleet or upgrading forces and make the most of the crew’s time while preparing for assault; enemy Cylon ships will close in with each action and turn players take.

#BattlestarGalacticaScatteredHopes #Gaming #IGN
title: Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Romeo is a Dead Man gets a new trailer and release date announcement. Watch the Romeo is a Dead Man release date trailer for this upcoming action game to see brutal gameplay, characters, and more. 

Romeo is a Dead Man will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam and Windows platforms) on February 11, 2026.

#IGN #RomeoIsADeadMan #ActionGame

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Season 21 Trailer for Rocket League, the hit vehicular action sports game developed by Psyonix and Epic Games. 

Players will take their skills to France as the new season for Rocket League features the legendary Parc de Paris Arena. Unlock new cars to use, skins to rock, and more, including items inspired by French duo Daft Punk that can be earned with the Rocket Pass Premium. 

Season 21 for Rocket League kicks off on December 10 through March 11 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#IGN #RocketLeague #ActionSports
title: Rocket League - Official Season 21 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the unsettling Poppy Playtime: Chapter 5 cinematic teaser trailer for this next chapter in the horror action-adventure game. The new trailer picks up right after Chapter 4's finale as we see Poppy trying to escape The Prototype, and a chilling new encounter. Poppy Playtime: Chapter 5 is available to wishlist now on Steam and Epic Games Store.

In Poppy Playtime: Chapter 5, players must prepare to face off against the deadly puppetmaster behind the horrifying events of Playtime Co. Solve devious puzzles and overcome dangerous obstacles as the true rotten heart at the center of Playtime Co. draws nearer. Traverse this new realm of shadows in a fight for survival (and the truth) with Playtime’s security system, Huggy Wuggy, in hot pursuit and separated from your only allies. Will you finally end this nightmare, or fall victim to the puppet master’s twisted madness?

#IGN #PoppyPlaytime #Horror
title: Poppy Playtime: Chapter 5 - Official Cinematic Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Killing Floor 3 trailer to see what to expect with Operation: Breakout. Operation Breakout takes Nightfall Operatives deep into the dark and dangerous jungles of Costa Rica, where an unseen enemy has escaped its former imprisonment, introducing the stealthy Stalker enemy to the game alongside the first new map, Prison. Operation: Breakout also adds DJ Scully as a playable specialist and a pair of deadly new primary weapons. Killing Floor 3's Operation: Breakout is out now on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X|S.

#KillingFloor3 #Gaming #IGN
title: Killing Floor 3 - Official Season 2 Operation: Breakout Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Dreams, the user-generated content game from Media Molecule has seen numerous fan made project created over the years, but Eupholace and 1Collaborator have taken it even further and created a brand new Banjo-Kazooie fan project inside of Dreams! 

The single level features all the trappings of a typical Banjo-Kazooie level, with some new features added and old ones modified. 

You can access Banjo-Kazooie Mumbomania through Dreams on PlayStation 4 (PS4) and PlayStation 5 (PS5) today! Check it out! https://indreams.me/dream/mSFcdDKSMkr

#IGN #Dreams #BanjoKazooie
title: Banjo-Kazooie Mumbomania - Dreams Fan Creation Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'A Safehouse in the Hills' Update Release Date Trailer for GTA Online, the hit open-world multiplayer component of Grand Theft Auto 5 developed by Rockstar Games.

Players who have graced the highest rungs of the criminal ladder can get a new safehouse in one of Los Santos’ most exclusive neighborhoods, customizable to their exact desires. The update is also fitted with new vehicles to collect, the return of a familiar face, and much more. 

The 'A Safehouse in the Hills' Update for GTA Online is launching on December 10 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #GTAOnline #GTA5
title: GTA Online - Official 'A Safehouse in the Hills' Update Release Date Trailer

Patch 7.4: Into the Mist for Final Fantasy 14 launches on December 16, 2025.

Players can get a look at fresh gameplay from the Fortnite Blitz Royale bite-sized game mode for Chapter Seven, offering new skins and content to enjoy. The Blitz Starfall Island Chapter Seven is available now.

author: IGN
description:
Three new dinosaur families arrive in Jurassic World Evolution 3. Watch the latest Jurassic World Evolution 3 trailer to see what's coming in the Wetlands Pack for the management sim game, which features hundreds of wetland & bayou-inspired scenery items, and new species as you design and build waterside environments for the Irritator, Austroraptor, and Hypsilophodon. The Wetlands Pack for Jurassic World Evolution 3 will be available on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X|S on December 9, 2025.

In Jurassic World Evolution 3, build your own Jurassic World. Nurture generations of dinosaurs with the series debut of juveniles, create and manage sprawling prehistoric parks around the globe, and let your imagination roar with powerful new creative options.

#IGN #JurassicWorldEvolution3 #ParkSim
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 - Official Wetlands Species Trailer

description:
Rise once more, Nightfarers… The Night is not through with you yet. 

Watch the Elden Ring Nightreign: The Forsaken Hollows launch trailer for this expansion for the multiplayer action soulslike RPG. Elden Ring Nightreign: The Forsaken Hollows features two new Nightfarers: The Scholar and the Undertaker, new Shifting Earth: The Great Hollows, new bosses, and new points of interest. Elden Ring Nightreign: The Forsaken Hollows is available now on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC.

In PROTECTOR, former war hero Nikki's peaceful life is shattered when her daughter is kidnapped. Thrust into the criminal underworld while hunted by cops and the military, she must fight to rescue her child.

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! This week Daemon, Max, Ryan, and Logan grade the Nintendo Switch 2's launch window. The Switch 2 broke Nintendo—and industry—records by becoming the fastest-selling console of all time. But how did it fare against the Switch 1's first six months? Did the Switch 2's lineup of Mario Kart World, Donkey Kong Bananza, and Metroid Prime 4: Beyond hold up agains the Switch 1's legendary 1-2-3 punch of Mario Kart 8 Deluxe, Super Mario Odyssey, and The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild? And what can we expect next year? Plus we have last episode's poll results and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.
00:00:21 Grading the Switch 2's launch window
00:01:13 Logan's grade
00:03:44 Ryan's grade
00:07:57 Max's grade
00:10:44 Looking ahead to 2026
00:14:27 Poll results
00:15:02 Outro
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Window Report Card - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description: Introducing Silent Road, a first-person psychological horror game where you play a taxi driver working the night shift in a forested region of Japan known for an unusually high suicide rate and sights of supernatural phenomena. The further you get into the night, the scarier it gets. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/4124320/Silent_Road
title: Silent Road: Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
If you like this video and would like to see more like it, make sure to subscribe to Eurogamer on YouTube. 

Terminator 2 is arguably one of the best films ever made, so it's very odd that it's taken 34 years for what looks like the first faithful (and good!) Terminator 2 game.

Terminator 2D: No Fate from Bitmap Bureau looks fantastic and we're very excited to play it, but what about the Terminator 2 games that came before? Most are fine, but none of them can beat the weirdness of the very first Terminator 2 game ever released. Watch Eurogamer's very own T-32 Ian Higton delve into the inspirations behind the development of Terminator 2D: No Fate and find out all about the history of the weirdest Terminator 2 game ever made, which, believe it or not, was developed in the 5th worst place to live IN THE WORLD!

This video was created by Ian Higton and was originally featured on Eurogamer.

#IGN #Eurogamer #Terminator2
title: The Terminator 2 Game That's Extremely Weird

author: IGN
description: Ahead of the release of the Avatar: Fire and Ash movie, Ubisoft and Massive are looking to launch a major update for Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora with gameplay and some new content to coincide with the film. 2024's entry to James Cameron's Avatar franchise, Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora is still going strong with the third person update. Here's are the opening minutes of the game in a whole new perspective.
title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - New Third Person Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Check out The Last of the Druids Release Date Trailer for Path of Exile 2, a free-to-play action RPG developed by Grinding Gear Games. Players will soon be able to access the content update, giving players the ability to shapeshift into a wolf, bear, or even a fire-breathing wyvern. The Last of the Druids update is also fitted with a new Ascendancy Class, a new innovative league mechanic, and a new Pinnacle endgame boss. The Last of the Druids is launching on December 12 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #gaming

Play solo or team up in co-op as a duo of thieves, plan the perfect hits, or improvise when things go wrong. From pickpocket to crime boss – only the best gangs will make it to the top. Thief Simulator 3 will be available on PC.

author: IGN
description: Check out 'The Day of Atonement' Special Anniversary Event Trailer for Warhammer 40,000: Darktide, a team-based horror action shooter developed by Fatshark. Players can adhere to the call for a Day of Atonement to beg dear Saint Messelina Gloriana for her forgiveness and protection for the beloved Tertium. Warhammer 40,000: Darktide is free to play starting on December 4 through December 8 on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
